Package gr.aueb.cf.model

Class Account

  • java.lang.Object
    • gr.aueb.cf.model.Account
  • public class Account
extends java.lang.Object
    This program manages a Bank's account where account has one beneficiary Account fields: IDs of the beneficiary IBAN of the account firstnames of the beneficiary lastnames of the beneficiary ssns (social security numbers) of the beneficiary balance of the account
    Version:
    1

      • deposit

        public boolean deposit​(double amount)
                throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        This method realizes a deposit in the account
        Parameters:
        amount - the amount to be deposited in the account
        Returns:
        true/false if the deposit was successful or not
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the log file is not found

      • withdraw

        public boolean withdraw​(double amount,
                        java.lang.String ssn)
                 throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        This method realizes a withdrawal in the account
        Parameters:
        amount - the amount to be withdrawn from the account
        ssn - the social security number of the client trying to make the withdrawal
        Returns:
        true/false if the withdrawal was successful or not
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the log file is not found
